name: Citrus Salmon with New Potatoes
author: NPet
summary: The perfect summer salmon recipe. Light but bursting with flavor. Salmon and broccolini are steamed on a bed of lemon, ginger, and garlic with orange juice and served with new potatoes.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 ½ cups freshly squeezed orange juice
1 cup finely chopped fresh mint, divided
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Meanwhile, place lemon slices on the bottom of a large skillet
Sprinkle 1 teaspoon ginger and 1 teaspoon garlic over the lemon slices
Season salmon with salt and pepper and place into the skillet
Pour in enough orange juice to just cover the lemon slices
Sprinkle 1/2 cup mint and remaining ginger and garlic on top of the salmon
Steam salmon over medium heat until no longer pink in the middle and flesh flakes easily with a fork, 8 to 10 minutes
Transfer 5 tablespoons of the orange juice mixture from the skillet to a small bowl
Whisk in remaining mint and olive oil to make a vinaigrette
Serve salmon fillets on a platter with potatoes, broccolini, and vinaigrette on the side
